resources.string:
Call Log Bluetooth is an app that saves you time and stress with its powerful viewing and Bluetooth Transfer capabilities.
This call log app also comes with the handy features like single tap dialing and single tap Google search of any number.\n\n
The Call Log Bluetooth app allows you to view call logs by different types including duration and location. It can display 100, 500 or all stored call logs at any time. The app also has powerful filter capabilities which allow you to see calls logs some specific location or duration.
